skillTree.localised_description: All Dwarfs are stubborn, but none more so than Grudgebearer, the founder of the Age of Reckoning.
The Runesmiths of Kraka Drak stand in the front lines, and with rhythmic percussions on the anvil they keep the warriors under constant protection.

effects.description:
Ward save: +2% for all units
	(all units in army)

Ward save: +5% for all units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: There are none more adept at metal-shaping than those who command the runes.
Raiders, Warriors of the Ruinous Powers, Daemons. After generations of struggle, the seething hatred against these foes has grown in an Ancestral Grudge.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
Weapon strength: +5% when fighting against Skaven

skillTree.localised_description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: With the power of Runic Magic at your side, there's little in this world or any other that can do to bring you low.
"Think of it as a belt *and* braces – protection on top of protection, in case they come at your with their foul magicks."
Proving their innate superiority, and with it that of the Dwarf race, runes can be used to hamper the Winds of Magic and therefore their benefit to the enemy.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -5 per turn
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: Seperate runes struck in the right order can call upon the different Ancestor Gods. Call upon Grimnir to unlock a furious energy.
Seperate runes struck in the right order can call upon the different Ancestor Gods. Call upon Grungni to improve the power of weapons and armour.
Seperate runes struck in the right order can call upon the different Ancestor Gods. Call upon Valaya for assurance of loyalty in crucial moments.
The most prestigious Wardlords accrue a bodyguard of trusted warriors around them, loyal brethren in an endless struggle.

effects.description:
Armour, Melee attack and Melee defence: +5 for Wardbearers
	(Lord's army)

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

skillTree.localised_description: Strike the iron when it is hot, and, moreover, when it doesn't expect it.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 for Stormbeards
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord has survived more than one skirmish and more than one serious wound.
The Dwarfs' natural anti-magic resistance is amplified to dampen the Winds of Magic.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: -10
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A red hot rune struck on the weapon, able to unleash devastating cleansing fire.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: -5
	(local region)

target_if: Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Speed"

skillTree.localised_description: Down in the deepest mines, there is a special kind of darkness that seems to stare back... and that might drive to insanity anyone who is not a Dawi.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: -5
	(local region)

target_if: Not on or below a platform

skillTree.localised_description: An endemic variant of the Rune of Might, it allows the bearer to fell the largest trolls with a couple of precise blows.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: -5
	(local region)

target_if: Not on or below a platform

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

effects.description: Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Negation"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Negation"

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The next thing I'm gonna hear from yer, Umgi, is 'I'm sorry, Master Dwarf, we were thoroughly lost'. That, or the sound of me axe splitting yer skull."

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -5% when in own territory
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +4 when in own territory
	(Lord's army)

Vigour loss reduction: -10% when in own territory
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +7 when in own territory
	(Lord's army)

Vigour loss reduction: -15% when in own territory
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +10 when in own territory
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This is yer ax! You shall kill with it! You shall work with it! You shall sleep with it! And then you shall kill some more!

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Braves, Rangers and Pathgrinders
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Braves, Rangers and Pathgrinders
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for Braves, Rangers and Pathgrinders
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Braves, Rangers and Pathgrinders
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Braves, Rangers and Pathgrinders
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord knows his throng thrives in ranged combat and expects his Clansdwarfs to excel in that discipline.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.
Glittering in runes, the elite of Kraka Drak is an inexorable force.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: +4% for Rune Drakkens
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Wardbearers, Stormbeards, Trollsearers, Orgi's Blades and Huskarls
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for all Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: +4% for Rune Drakkens
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Wardbearers, Stormbeards, Trollsearers, Orgi's Blades and Huskarls
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Wardbearers, Stormbeards, Trollsearers, Orgi's Blades and Huskarls
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for all Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for all Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: +6% for Rune Drakkens
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Wardbearers, Stormbeards, Trollsearers, Orgi's Blades and Huskarls
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Wardbearers, Stormbeards, Trollsearers, Orgi's Blades and Huskarls
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for all Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for all Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Although missile weapons do not have a strong appeal to any true son of Kraka Drak, some have mastered the art of shooting large beasts dead with anything they were wielding.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +6% for Bolt Throwers, Grudge Throwers, Trollsearers, Frostdrakes and Spikegunners
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +6% for Bolt Throwers, Grudge Throwers, Trollsearers, Frostdrakes and Spikegunners
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Bolt Throwers, Grudge Throwers, Trollsearers, Frostdrakes and Spikegunners
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +12% for Bolt Throwers, Grudge Throwers, Trollsearers, Frostdrakes and Spikegunners
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Bolt Throwers, Grudge Throwers, Trollsearers, Frostdrakes and Spikegunners
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Interlocking shields, dirty and astute tricks, even human allies are all cards to the smart Lord deck.

effects.description:
Armour: +5 for all melee infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack and defence: +4 for all Norscan units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +7 for all melee infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +5% for all infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack and defence: +6 for all Norscan units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for all melee infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for all infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
In the warlike north, the shieldwall attacks back.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: +15% for shielded units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for shielded units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: There is nothing more irritating than a foe beyond axe distance.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for dual-wielding units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for dual-wielding units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A large axe is solid and reliable. You only live once.

effects.description:
Bonus vs. Large: +5 for two-handed units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for two-handed units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
A patrol here, a falling rock there, and the enemy's day is ruined. Forever.
Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: A Dwarf with a fine beard is as Dawi as they come.
Lords close to the powerful Masons' Guild will get discounts for labour and materials.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -2% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -5% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -9% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: Such a Dawi does not care for being wounded - by his will alone he continues to fight.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "All Dwarfs to me! We have grudges to settle - Grimnir demands it!"
Get the wretches! Kill 'em! Maim 'em! Burn 'em! In whichev'r order!
A wise Lord will gather Engineers to his service, ensuring the Dwarfs maintain their technological edge.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This brave Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grimnir, the Warrior-God.
This industrious Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grungni, God of Mines and Smiths.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -15% for all buildings
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This loyal Dawi can trace his lineage back to Valaya, Goddess of Healing and Protection.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
All Norse Dwarfs are a hot-tempered lot, but this one...

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This Dwarf has knowledge of the territory and its dangers, and has experimented to work with them.

effects.description:
Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from Chaos Undivided corruption and Chaos Wastes attrition
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Any Norse Dwarf would gladly burn Chaos Worshippers down to their black nails. This one would just keep them alive in the process.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +25% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca

Weapon strength: +5% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: To the point of being picky, this Wardlord hardly wears anything that he didn't craft himself.

target_if: Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +7%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Famous for having asked "So, who died?" pointing at his own funerary pyre, this Dwarf has a knack at turning out alive after the most disastrous calamities.
